• FFP and FDP may be used interchangeable. 
• Change sets: 
 Between red cells of different groups. 
 Between different products. 
 After 4 units of red cells or every 12 hours. 
• An emergency crossmatch takes approximately 20 -30 minutes. A blood grouping and partial screening for 
antibodies are performed prior to release of units. Rest of the crossmatch are performed after units are issued.
